msContents.summary: The first two faded and incomplete lines look like the final address of a letter. After that, a chrism and another letter begins which mentions that something was sent. The second letter is addressed to Menas and mentions a camel-load of wheat.

msItemStruct.note: 13 lines of writing on the front.
The hand is large and irregular.
Incomplete on the top, bottom, and perhaps on the right.
Registered to Sohair Ahmed until Feb. 1, 2022. After this date, please direct inquiries to the Columbia Rare Book and Manuscript Library: rbml@library.columbia.edu.
